level.heading: Transition of licensed marriage and family therapists.
level.text: For a period of 2 years following March 10, 2004, all reference to a licensed marriage and family therapist shall be deemed to refer to a person meeting the requirements for licensure in the District, regardless of whether that person is licensed.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-88
level.text: For Law 15-88, see notes following ยง 3-1201.01.
